sourcesContent:
Step 4

Review the following information and submit
Username:
{{ formData.inputUserName }}
Name:
{{ formData.inputFirstName }},{{ formData.inputLastName }}
Organization Name:
{{ formData.inputOrganizationName }}
Location:
{{ formData.inputStateAddress }},{{ formData.inputCountryAddress }}
Email Address:
{{ formData.inputEmailAddress }}
Phone Number:
{{ formData.inputPhoneNumber }}
Birthday:
{{ formData.inputBirthday }}
inputIdentification:
{{ formData.inputBirthday }}
